amendment.description: An amendment to transfer $3,000,000 from the salaries and expenses account of the Office of the Secretary to the safety and operations account of the Federal Railroad Adminstration.

action.text: Mr. Latham raised a point of order against the Meehan amendment (A001). Mr. Latham stated that the amendment seeks to amend portions of the bill not yet read. The Chair sustained the point of order.
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A001) offered by Mr. Meehan.
